===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – an ear. The opening of the ear becomes the surrounding box {{zh-l|*口}}, the cartilage inside the ear yields the lines {{zh-l|*二}}, while the earlobe becomes the lower right corner {{zh-l|*十}}.

===Etymology===
The anatomical sense is from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*r/g-na}}.
